Keywords: Robot , Sentinel
Real Name: None
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
PRIME DIRECTIVE: At the beginning of your turn, Sentinel Mark II may move 1 square. If an opposing character with the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword is on the map, they may move 1 additional square.
HUNTER KILLER: When Sentinel Mark II KO's a character, after resolutions heal it 1 click. Once per game, if the KO'd character has either the Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword or team ability, modify its combat values by +1 this game.
PATH OF DESTRUCTION: Running Shot, Force Blast. Force Blast as FREE.
ADAPTIVE MEASURES: Energy Shield/Deflection, Toughness.
INCINERATE: If Sentinel Mark II rolls doubles with a successful attack roll, the damage dealt by that attack is penetrating and can't be evaded.
